slides.translation: Next to your greatness is so small
I put everything before you
Bowing with fearfulness
I believe that you're hearing us
I believe that you're seeing us
I believe that you are working now
And we are going to see salvation
ALWAYS VICTORIOUS

slides.originalText: אנו צמאים לך, בוא גלה את פניך
slides.transliteration: Anu tsamim l'ch, Bo galah et panecha
slides.translation: We are thirsty for you come reveal yourself to us
We are thirsty for you, Yeshua come

slides.originalText: אנו צמאים לך, בוא ושפוך את רוחך
slides.transliteration: Anu tsamim l'cha, bo ushpoch et Ruchecha
slides.translation: We are thirsty for you, come pour your spirit
We are hungry for you, Yeshua come

slides.originalText: תן לאש לפול, תן לאש לפול
slides.transliteration: Ten la'eish lipol, ten la'eish lipol
slides.translation: Let your fire fall
You've brought us to the fountain

slides.originalText: נהר עצום של אש זורם ממך
slides.transliteration: Nahar atsum shel eish zorem mimcha
slides.translation: a river of fire flows from you
You brought us to the fountain
to drink and be filled with you
How much love is there reqiured
to agree to such a price
For the transgressions of others
How much lobe have my eyes seen
See how good
See how good Yeshua is
Everything has been paid there
Betwen the two thieves
And still, I continue
The hit the nails

slides.originalText: אבל אני נושע, כי אתה סלחת לי
slides.transliteration: aval ani nosha ki ata salakhata li
slides.translation: But I am saved because You have forgiven me

slides.originalText: אני בוחר בך כי אתה בחרת בי
slides.transliteration: ani bokher bekha ki ata bakharta bi
slides.translation: I choose Youo because You have chosen me
I come back to You
And exchange my yoke for Yours
Teach me to walk again
To walk after You
To walk at Your rhythm
Teach me to walk again
I tried and failed,
But You never stopped waiting

slides.originalText: חיכית כי חפצת, לא וויתרת עד היום
slides.transliteration: khikita ki khafatzta lo vitarta ad hayom
slides.translation: You waited because You desired
And now I am beginning to see
How much love and
That the King of the universe
How much humility and
That the King of Glory
I come back to you
With understanding that
Open my eyes to see
To see what I have missed
I thought I knew it all
Open my eyes to see
How much love and how much patience
That the King of the universe
How much humility and
That the King of Glory

slides.originalText: גילית כי חפצת, לא וויתרת עד היום
slides.transliteration: khikita ki khafatzta lo vitarta ad hayom
slides.translation: You revealed because you desired
slides.translationOverflow: You have not given up till today

slides.translation: And now I am beginning to see
Reveal Yourself to us
He waits for us
